data.name: Twin Angel BREAK: Yuimaru! The Field Trip to Okinawa
data.short_description: It's the day of the St. Cherrine Academy field trip! Meguru and her friends are all excited about their trip to Okinawa, but things get even better when they happen to run into the idol group, The Twenty-Eights! After helping with their event during the day, Meguru earns an invitation to their conce
